name: Splintering Weapon
prerequisiteFormula: @bab >= 1 AND @proficiency:selected_weapon AND "Weapon made of primitive material"
descriptionText: Your fragile weapon works to your advantage, breaking off fragments in wounds you inf lict.
benefitText: Whenever you use a melee or thrown weapon with the fragile weapon feature (page 146) or similar quality and hit an opponent, you can give your weapon the broken condition to deal that opponent 1d4 points of bleed damage.
